login.desc: Sign in to manage your participation

login.phoneInfo: Phone number must include area code e.g. +48500400300 without spaces

login.forgot-password-desc: To recall your password, please enter the email address you provided during registration
login.password-change-desc: Enter your new password twice to change your password

participation_types.expert_desc: A person who is a speaker at an event. Requires approval from the organizer.

register.title: Registration

register.agreementsError: Select all required consents (marked in red)

If you have encountered a problem, please contact us:

buyer_data.dontIncludeCountryCode: Please enter VATIN without country code at the beginning

paid.descCompleted: Your payment has been confirmed. Thank you for your payment. You can now proceed to your account.
paid.descCanceled: Your payment has been declined. To retry using PayU, please click the button below.
paid.descAwaitingBankTransfer: Please make the transfer to the account number provided on the proforma invoice we sent to the e-mail address provided during registration or download it below.

profile.deleteSure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.deleteSureDesc: Then you will permanently lose the ability to enter the event using the ticket assigned to this account.
profile.no: No, I don't want to delete the account
profile.deletedDesc: The account has been permanently deleted

ticket_method.buy: I want to buy a ticket
ticket_method.partner: I am an infraBIM 2023 partner delegate
ticket_method.go_back: < Go back to choose how to get a ticket

agreements.first: I consent to the processing of personal data contained in the form for the purposes of participation in the event and other needs contained in the above regulations by the Administrator (i.e. infraTEAM) in accordance with the Act of May 10, 2018 on the protection of personal data (Journal of Laws of 2018, item 1000) and in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46 / EC (GDPR ). PODO Privacy Policy
agreements.second: I consent to the recording of my image during the event in the form of photos and videos and for its dissemination by the Operator - infraTEAM.
agreements.third: I consent to the transfer of my personal data to the Fundacja Rozwoju Przedsiębiorczości "Twój StartUp" for the purpose of technical service of the event.
agreements.fourth: I declare that I have read the Terms and Conditions, and accept its regulations.
agreements.fifth: I don't want to receive any e-mails about this event and upcoming events.
RODOcompany: I consent to the processing of personal data to

validators.alpha: The {_field_} field can only contain alphabetic characters
validators.alpha_num: The {_field_} field can only contain alphanumeric characters
validators.alpha_dash: The {_field_} field can contain alphanumeric characters as well as hyphens and underscores
validators.alpha_spaces: The {_field_} field can only contain alphabetic characters and spaces
validators.digits: The {_field_} field must be numeric and contain exactly {length} digits
validators.dimensions: The {_field_} field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
validators.email: The {_field_} field must contain a valid email address
validators.excluded: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
validators.mimes: The {_field_} field must have a valid file type
validators.numeric: The {_field_} field can only contain numeric characters
validators.oneOf: The field {_field_} is not a valid value
validators.password: {_field_} must contain one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one special character and be 6 characters long
validators.regex: The format of the {_field_} field is invalid
validators.double: The {_field_} field must contain a valid floating point value
